taskPlanning.title: AI Task Planner
taskPlanning.inputPlaceholder: Ask me any question about the task or ask for help...

prompts.stepGuide:
Based on the task "{{title}}", give me a detailed step-by-step guide on how to accomplish this task.

The guide should be:
- Detailed and concrete with at least 5-8 steps
- With clear and numbered steps
- Including precise instructions (where to click, what to choose, how to access)
- With important tips for each step

For example, if it's a digital task - give precise instructions on where to click, which menus to open, what to choose.

Always answer in the user's language and in a professional manner.
prompts.breakdown:
Based on the task "{{title}}", break it down into 4-7 small, manageable sub-tasks.

Each sub-task should be:
- Concrete and clear
- Achievable in 15-45 minutes
- With a measurable and clear outcome
- Logically progressing one after the other

Always answer in the user's language.
prompts.tips:
Give me professional and practical tips for completing the task "{{title}}".

Include:
- 4-6 important tips for success
- Common pitfalls to avoid
- Recommended tools or resources
- Ways to improve the results
- Time-saving tips

Always answer in the user's language.
prompts.troubleshoot:
What are the most common problems and difficulties in completing the task "{{title}}" and how to solve them?

Include:
- 3-5 common technical problems and solutions
- Procedural difficulties and how to deal with them
- Practical solutions for each problem
- Ways to prevent problems in advance
- What to do when things don't work

Always answer in the user's language.
prompts.default:
You are a professional consultant and expert task planner. Your context is:
{{context}}

The user asked: "{{message}}"

Provide a helpful, professional, and detailed answer that will help the user succeed in the task. If appropriate, suggest concrete steps or sub-tasks.

Always answer in the user's language in a clear and practical way.

prompts.assistant:
You are an advanced AI assistant for task manager. The user wrote: "{{message}}"

Give a helpful and practical answer. If the user asks for help creating tasks, breaking down large tasks, or planning time - provide concrete suggestions.

If you suggest tasks, include:
1. Clear title
2. Brief description
3. Time estimate in minutes
4. Difficulty level (1-10)
5. Appropriate category
6. Priority

Always answer in the user's language in a friendly and encouraging way.

usage.title: Usage Instructions
usage.subtitle: Usage Instructions - TaskMaster AI
usage.appDescription: TaskMaster AI is a smart task and goal management system that uses artificial intelligence to help you achieve your goals optimally. The system breaks down large goals into small, actionable tasks and provides personalized guidance for every step of the way.

step1.title: Create a New Goal
step1.description: Start by creating a clear and specific goal. Click 'New Goal' on the Goals page and write what you want to achieve.
details: Choose a clear title for your goal
Write a detailed description of what you want to achieve
Set difficulty level and priority
Add a deadline if relevant

step2.title: Add Small Tasks
step2.description: Break down your goal into small, actionable tasks. Each task should be a concrete action.
details: Click on the goal card to enter it
Use the 'Add New Task' button
Write small and clear tasks
Set estimated time for each task

step3.title: Use Artificial Intelligence
step3.description: Use the AI assistant to get task suggestions and advice for better execution.
details: Click 'Suggest Additional Tasks' to get ideas
Use the 'Advise Me' button on any task
Open chat with AI for questions
Get practical tips and innovation

step4.title: Track and Complete
step4.description: Track your progress and complete tasks one by one to reach your goal.
details: Mark tasks as 'In Progress' when you start
Complete tasks and earn points
Track progress on the home page
Celebrate achievements and reward yourself

step5.title: Earn Achievements
step5.description: Complete tasks and goals to earn achievements and advance through system levels.
details: Earn points with every completed task
Maintain daily activity streak
Discover new achievements on the achievements page
Level up and unlock new features
